SELECT a.id,b.`name` ,a.date,a.begintime,a.endtime,a.`user`,a.mobile,a.mark FROM reservation a LEFT JOIN room b on a.room_id=b.id WHERE date>CURDATE() AND a.mark='待审核' ORDER BY id limit #{toPageNo}, #{pageSize}

SELECT a.id,b.`name` ,a.date,a.begintime,a.endtime,a.`user`,a.mobile,a.mark FROM reservation a LEFT JOIN room b on a.room_id=b.id WHERE date>CURDATE() AND mark!='取消申请' ORDER BY date DESC limit #{toPageNo}, #{pageSize}

SELECT a.id,b.`name` ,a.date,a.begintime,a.endtime,a.`user`,a.mobile,a.mark FROM reservation a LEFT JOIN room b on a.room_id=b.id WHERE date>CURDATE() AND a.mark='待审核' AND a.user LIKE '%${value}%' ORDER BY id
